Text: MS Enewsletterpst Hi There is some exciting BP MS news we want to let you know about Enewsletter Topics Reminder Demo Day and Training Program Kickoff Updated Training Ride Schedule Upcoming Rides BP MS BIKE DEMO DAY AND TRAINING PROGRAM KICKOFF Come to the Picnic Loop at Memorial Party on Saturday Jan from am until am to find out how to train for the BP MS Bike Tour Cyclists can sign up for the Bike Tour and for the Official Training Program run by USA Fit Visit with Health Clubs and Bike Stores to find out about the latest spinning classes and cycling gear You can even testride a new bike Come out early to get a free Taco Cabana breakfast taco More details mstrainingdayasp TRAINING RIDE SCHEDULE February Kingwood am February Katy am February Tom Bass Park am February Magnolia am March Chappell Hill am March Austin am March Katy am Latest updates always available msridetrainingridesasp UPCOMING RIDES GATOR RIDE The Gator Ride for is set for March nd The Gator Ride is a noncompetitive bike ride held annually in Baytown TX to benefit the Baytown YMCA Several different routeslengths to choose from Details and registration BLUEBONNET METRIC CENTURY The Bluebonnet Metric Century is coming up Sunday March am start Tour the beautiful Waller and Grimes countryside when the bluebonnets are starting to bloom Details and registration This email was sent to you because you are a member of the MS Enewsletter mailing list If you wish to remove yourself from the mailing list or modify your subscription please use the following link enewsletterindexcfmidemail
